resources.string: COVID-19 affects different \n people in different ways.
Most common symptoms are fever, \n dry cough, tiredness.

On average it takes 5â€“6 days 
 from when someone is infected 
 with the virus for symptoms to show, 
 however it can take up to 17 days.
Clean your hands often. \n Use soap and water,\n or an alcohol-based hand rub.
Touch your eyes, nose or mouth.
Wear a mask when physical \n distancing is not possible.
Don\'t stay your home \n because it\'s like a boringness.
If you have a fever, cough and difficulty \n breathing, seek medical attention.
You\'ve noticed you cannot \n smell or taste anything.
The Old are safe from Corona Virus.
In 2019, a new coronavirus was identified\n as the cause of a disease outbreak \n that originated in USA.
In March 2020, the World Health \n Organization (WHO) declared the COVID-19.
People who are Younger have a higher \n risk of serious illness from COVID-19.
Coronaviruses are a family of \n viruses that can cause illnesses \n such as the common cold.
